Sherlock Holmes versus Arsene Lupin: The Case of The Golden Blonde
Maurice Leblanc; adapted into English by J. B. 
NY: Atomic Books, 1946 https://t.co/G54NDAN5OZ 75,000 printed, all but 25 wholly trimmed. All but a few trimmed (trade) copies destroyed / suppressed by Doyle estate https://t.co/hUqrE3YmkU

Maurice Leblanc; adapted into English by J. B.

#OTD 1837,  abolitionist printer Elijah P. Lovejoy was killed by a mob in Alton, Illinois, while attempting to protect his printing shop from being destroyed a third time. Pictured here: Alton Observer https://t.co/IIg3zhYO0S https://t.co/TbTRi3vcvq

Bird's eyeview of Peshtigo Wisconsin Sept 1871 Destroyed by fire night of October 8, 1871
https://t.co/sN9TAHU6W4 https://t.co/JAsuxyEraB

During the dictatorship of Chilean general Augusto Pinochet in the 1970s and 80s, protesters painted hundreds of politically-charged murals. Pinochet's government destroyed most of them, but photos by Andrés Romero Spethman live on -- free online here: https://t.co/WBlvkE6SxW https://t.co/eGXhBdsd0U

#OTD 1837, abolitionist printer Elijah P. Lovejoy was killed by a mob in Alton, Illinois, while attempting to protect his printing shop from being destroyed a third time. Here: https://t.co/LTz2ddUc40 https://t.co/PP4jVMdfrm

"...let there be no change by usurpation; for though this, in one instance, may be the instrument of good, it is the customary weapon by which free governments are destroyed." Washington, Farewell Address https://t.co/79l1LpTzT8 (Image: https://t.co/kIiEyms4dT) https://t.co/IX340Y52MC

#OTD 1837,  abolitionist printer Elijah P. Lovejoy was killed by a mob in Alton, Illinois, while attempting to protect his printing shop from being destroyed a third time. Pictured here: Alton Observer https://t.co/IIg3zhYO0S https://t.co/cU1VV0EpRP

"Dear Dr. Williams: I enclose finally some of my recent work ... " letter from Allen Ginsberg letter 12/9/55 to William Carlos Williams, incl. Howl: For Carl Solomon, in WCW Papers @YCAL_JWJ https://t.co/ergxoFP7s5 "I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness .. " https://t.co/Au6sMPt3ir
"Faust's own future will be destroyed through the fire of concupiscentia and its madness." Prof. Dr. C.G. Jung in https://t.co/XeYZk6bqv5 https://t.co/c7qTuYqYgq
RT @UTexasPress: Belgium's @LeuvenU library was destroyed in WWI. @utlibraries gave books to help rebuild! #LibraryLove #books https://t.co…
@seenigel @jrab yes, you can get a library card at your nearest branch. Sorry for the trouble; card/app was destroyed for your protection.
